pkgmetadata.longdescription: Helper Tools for Managing Data, Dates, Missing Values, and Text // An assortment of helper functions for managing data (e.g., rotating values in matrices by a user-defined angle, switching from row- to column-indexing), dates (e.g., intuiting year from messy date strings), handling missing values (e.g., removing elements/rows across multiple vectors or matrices if any have an NA), text (e.g., flushing reports to the console in real- time); and combining data frames with different schema (copying, filling, or concatenating columns or applying functions before combining).
